::FireBlade::
FireBlade crawled out of Autofire...
His legs now fully functioning...
"Commander Sir, It was the right choice that Autofire made to pull 
out...WE were out numbered 3 to 1 and many of us were taking more 
hits then we could deal, Sir."
Fireblade finished and stood to attention beside the slightly taller 
Autofire. 
'He saved my life...like I do for the ones I msut protect. I will 
stand by whatever Autofire does....Unless SwitchBlade disagrees.' he 
thought to himself


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Autofire::
> 
> Autofire lands in front of Megatron, noting that his employer was
> pretty pissed off.
> 
> "We attacked, and the Alliance attacked our backs," he knew the
> Alliance from having been allied with them when he first got to the
> planet, "Then another faction attacked the Maximals, and another
> faction attacked that faction. You told me to attack, not conquer, 
so
> I had the troops pull back before a few of them died."
> 
> He wasn't afraid of Megatron, since the Decepticon commander would
> have to reach up pretty far to hit him.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., gestalt_menasor@y... wrote:

towards

> cursing

parts,

walked

Strip, "What

will
